title: New & Video: Kirk Spencer – Kukcu (feat. Safia May)
content:
With the beginning of a new week creeping ever closer, and the familiar tedium of Monday only a few hours away, what’s more appropriate than a piece of music that questions the very fabric of ones mind? Nothing’s more appropriate.

The debut single from Kirk Spencer may be a bit too much for the more fragile amongst you this Sunday, if that’s the case then maybe listen to it tomorrow, because Kukcu is rather spectacular piece of music. Its masterful melding of tones is the track’s greatest strength, if not simply ambitious in the extreme. Spencer juxtaposes the soft and mature voice of Safia May, with thick synths, pulsating beats and reverberating south-Asian samples to create something that’s actually rather violent and intimidating; in the best possible way.

Spencer’s EP Wonderland is set to be released March 25.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
